hadiths.text: Mu'adh bin Jabal narrated that:the Messenger of Allah sent him to Yemen and said to him: “Take grains from grains, sheep from sheep, camels from camels and cows from cows”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا تَجِبُ فِيهِ الزَّكَاةُ مِنَ الأَمْوَالِ
chapter.eng-name: Wealth on which Zakat is due
